title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) built with SvelteKit.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with extra conveniences.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama (published as ‘ollama’ on RubyGems).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama, available on NuGet as ‘Ollama’.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose examples for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Example repo showing Retrieval-Augmented Generation with Ollama, LangChain & Chroma.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels via slash commands.

title: ollama-express
summary: Lightweight Express.js proxy that adds JWT auth & rate-limiting in front of Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that talks to Ollama via the Python client with session memory.
